caption:
After earning his first top 10 album with his debut project 'Next,' @xaviiiofficiall says he's eager to explore all kinds of genres — sometimes simultaneously.

“We’re talking about R&B, we’re talking about música mexicana. When you get all those elements and put them into one, it literally becomes its own — it brings out this new sound,” he says. “The studio is a kitchen, you know?”

He chats more about bringing "something new" to Latin music in his Billboard digital exclusive Genre Now cover story at the link in bio.

📸: @jrcmccord
